video_library.desc: If you've been to Atlassian Summit before, then you know our biggest event of the year is not all work and no play. Check out our highlight reel from Summit 2016 to see the action from last year and get a taste of what's in store for Summit 2017.
video_library.title: Atlassian Summit 2016 - highlights

video_library.desc: In the 3 years since its launch, more than 20,000 teams have adopted JIRA Service Desk for both IT and external support.
video_library.title: See JIRA Service Desk in Action - Atlassian Summit 2016

video_library.desc: Join me for a brief introduction to JIRA & Agile Project Management. I'll talk about basic Agile concepts. I'll show you basic JIRA planning and working with Scrum and Kanban. And I'll show you the most important reports to master so you can build great software just like Atlassian.
video_library.title: Introduction to JIRA & Agile Project Management

video_library.desc: How To Use JIRA tool For Scrum Projects
video_library.title: How To Use JIRA tool For Scrum Projects

video_library.desc: This talk will share lessons learned migrating Atlassian external-facing customer service teams to JIRA Service Desk, and demonstrate practical tips to help your customer service teams get the most out of JIRA Service Desk, JIRA, and JIRA plugins.
video_library.title: How to Support External Customers with JIRA Service Desk

video_library.desc: An in-depth product demonstration of Atlassian's team-collaboration platform, Confluence. This video provides an overview of Atlassian and Confluence, as well as a demonstration of how you can create, discover, and take action on your most important work in Confluence. The video also shows off Confluence's deep integrations, and add-ons.
video_library.title: Atlassian Confluence Demonstration Video

video_library.desc: Straight from the horse's mouth -- HipChat's very own Pete Curley shares how his team uses HipChat to collaborate and drive the future development of Atlassian's newest family member. So meta.
video_library.title: How HipChat Powers the HipChat Team
